00047 #undef _MODEL_NVARS_

00049 #define _MODEL_NDIMS_ 2

00051 #define _MODEL_NVARS_ 3

00053 /* choices for upwinding schemes */

00059 /* grid direction */
00060 #undef _XDIR_
00061 #undef _YDIR_

00063 #define _XDIR_ 0
00064 #define _YDIR_ 1
00065 
00073 #define _ShallowWater2DGetFlowVar_(u,h,uvel,vvel) \
00074   { \
00075     h    = u[0]; \
00076     uvel = u[1] / h; \
00077     vvel = u[2] / h; \
00078   }
00079 
00091 #define _ShallowWater2DSetFlux_(f,h,uvel,vvel,g,dir) \
00092   { \
00093     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00094       f[0] = (h) * (uvel); \
00095       f[1] = (h) * (uvel) * (uvel) + 0.5 * (g) * (h) * (h); \
00096       f[2] = (h) * (uvel) * (vvel); \
00097     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00098       f[0] = (h) * (vvel); \
00099       f[1] = (h) * (uvel) * (vvel); \
00100       f[2] = (h) * (vvel) * (vvel) + 0.5 * (g) * (h) * (h); \
00101     } \
00102   }
00103 
00108 #define _ShallowWater2DRoeAverage_(uavg,uL,uR,p) \
00109   { \
00110     double h , uvel , vvel ; \
00111     double hL, uvelL, vvelL; \
00112     double hR, uvelR, vvelR; \
00113     _ShallowWater2DGetFlowVar_(uL,hL,uvelL,vvelL); \
00114     _ShallowWater2DGetFlowVar_(uR,hR,uvelR,vvelR); \
00115     h    = 0.5 * (hL    + hR   ); \
00116     uvel = (sqrt(hL)*uvelL + sqrt(hR)*uvelR) / (sqrt(hL) + sqrt(hR)); \
00117     vvel = (sqrt(hL)*vvelL + sqrt(hR)*vvelR) / (sqrt(hL) + sqrt(hR)); \
00118     uavg[0] = h; \
00119     uavg[1] = h*uvel; \
00120     uavg[2] = h*vvel; \
00121   }
00122 
00129 #define _ShallowWater2DEigenvalues_(u,D,p,dir) \
00130   { \
00131     double h,uvel,vvel,c; \
00132     _ShallowWater2DGetFlowVar_(u,h,uvel,vvel); \
00133     c = sqrt(p->g*h); \
00134     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00135       D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = uvel-c; D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      \
00136       D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = uvel;   D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      \
00137       D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = uvel+c; \
00138     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00139       D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vvel-c; D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;      D[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      \
00140       D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = vvel;   D[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0;      \
00141       D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0;      D[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vvel+c; \
00142     } \
00143   }
00144 
00154 #define _ShallowWater2DLeftEigenvectors_(u,L,p,dir) \
00155   { \
00156     double h,uvel,vvel,c; \
00157     _ShallowWater2DGetFlowVar_(u,h,uvel,vvel); \
00158     c    = sqrt(p->g*h); \
00159     \
00160     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00161       L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0.5 + uvel/(2*c); \
00162       L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = -1.0/(2*c); \
00163       L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00164       \
00165       L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vvel; \
00166       L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00167       L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = -1.0; \
00168       \
00169       L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0.5 - uvel/(2*c); \
00170       L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 1.0/(2*c); \
00171       L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00172       \
00173     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00174       L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0.5 + vvel/(2*c); \
00175       L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00176       L[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = -1.0/(2*c); \
00177       \
00178       L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = -uvel; \
00179       L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 1.0; \
00180       L[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 0.0; \
00181       \
00182       L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 0.5 - vvel/(2*c); \
00183       L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00184       L[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 1.0/(2*c); \
00185     } \
00186   }
00187 
00197 #define _ShallowWater2DRightEigenvectors_(u,R,p,dir) \
00198   { \
00199     double h,uvel,vvel,c; \
00200     _ShallowWater2DGetFlowVar_(u,h,uvel,vvel); \
00201     c    = sqrt(p->g*h); \
00202     \
00203     if (dir == _XDIR_) { \
00204       R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1.0; \
00205       R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = uvel-c; \
00206       R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vvel; \
00207       \
00208       R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00209       R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00210       R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = -1.0;\
00211       \
00212       R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 1.0; \
00213       R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = uvel+c; \
00214       R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vvel; \
00215       \
00216     } else if (dir == _YDIR_) { \
00217       R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = 1.0; \
00218       R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = uvel; \
00219       R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+0] = vvel-c; \
00220       \
00221       R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0; \
00222       R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 1.0; \
00223       R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+1] = 0.0;\
00224       \
00225       R[0*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = 1.0; \
00226       R[1*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = uvel; \
00227       R[2*_MODEL_NVARS_+2] = vvel+c; \
00228     } \
00229   }
